text.div:
Generated Narrative: Requirements CHE.FXREQ.018.B

Profile: SGRequirements

These requirements apply to the actor Health worker

extension.valueString: To be able to route the consultation via different health workers and save the information already entered to the consultation, even if the consultation is not yet complete, enabling other health workers to see the information already entered and to be able to add/edit information as it becomes available
I do not have to start a new consultation for every health worker that the client is involved with

To be able to route the consultation via different health workers and save the information already entered to the consultation, even if the consultation is not yet complete, enabling other health workers to see the information already entered and to be able to add/edit information as it becomes available

To be able to route the consultation via different health workers and save the information already entered to the consultation, even if the consultation is not yet complete, enabling other health workers to see the information already entered and to be able to add/edit information as it becomes available

extension.valueMarkdown: *Business process* (B) Assess and Classify the Sick Child: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to route the consultation via different health workers and save the information already entered to the consultation, even if the consultation is not yet complete, enabling other health workers to see the information already entered and to be able to add/edit information as it becomes available so that >I do not have to start a new consultation for every health worker that the client is involved with
